attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are forums on the internet which are full of complaints about Internet Service Providers getting people into a 12 month minumum contract and not allowing them to receive their MAC code and get out of the contract unless they pay their way out of the contract.

Ofcom and the ISPA have said they have no regulatory powers to enforce quality of service or bad practice amongst ISPs.

There is no minimum contract for phone line rental, there should be no minium contract for broadband.

Ofcom should justify their existence and actually do something for once.
